summary: Central module that aggregates CKAN's SQLAlchemy model definitions and provides utilities for database engine handling, model initialization, identifier validation, configuration parsing, and a Repository class that orchestrates database lifecycle actions such as creation, migration, downgrade, cleaning and resetting using Alembic.
business_intent: Enable the CKAN platform to reliably set up, maintain, and evolve its relational database schema, ensuring that all data model entities are available to the application and that schema versions can be managed automatically across deployments.
